english.segment1: You don't own me, But you wish you did. I feel that life is moving way too fast.
english.segment2: You apologize, But I don't hear, You think its easy to make believe that I still care.
english.segment4: Sometimes life brings you down, But there's no better way to make you understand, The truth will hurt, especially when your right, But mostly when your wrong.
english.segment5: Sensitive, Thats what you are, There has to be a willingness to change on both our parts.
english.segment6: You say you listen, But you don't hear. I'm sick and tired of trying to make my conscience clear.
